p.strong: The All-in-One, On-Demand, Business Transformation Platform

div.p: Everything your business needs to scale—on demand, in one place. The Transformation Superstore is your central command for business enablement, bringing together embedded fintech, ERP, commerce tech, and monetization tools under a single roof. Designed for those who want control, not complexity, this all-in-one platform eliminates fragmentation, reduces costs, and equips you to build infrastructure, not just workflows.

div.h4: Discover What’s Possible with the Solutions Configurator
div.p:
Need a single product quote? Or a full enterprise solution to transform your business from the ground up? The Solutions Configurator puts the entire Transformation Superstore at your fingertips.
Select exactly what you need—from standalone devices to full-scale ERP + Fintech + Hardware bundles.
Build and customize your own solution stack—fast, easy, and fully guided.
Instantly generate detailed quotes—whether for a single touch point or an enterprise-wide rollout.
One tool. Endless possibilities. Built to empower your next move.
Ready to unlock your transformation? Start configuring now. Add a button to scroll down to the configurator container.
The Foundation of Your Business Infrastructure
Why settle and pay for a retail payment gateway account when you can have a complete payment gateway for less??
Our payment gateway is more than just a tool—it's the backbone of modern commerce, enabling businesses to serve customers with unmatched flexibility and efficiency.
div.h4: Direct connect your business to the global payment networks!!

div.p: B2B, eCommerce, cCommerce, retail, mobile, email, or via mail/phone orders, our gateway supports every transaction channel.
From credit cards to ACH, QR codes, Google Pay, Apple Pay, we've got you covered.
Accept payments in nearly 90 currencies to grow without limits.
Reliable, secure infrastructure ensures transactions happen in real-time, any time of day.
Controlling the full payment gateway means lower costs, customized workflows, and faster decision-making—giving you a significant advantage over competitors reliant on retail gateways.
Full cCommerce: Transform Every Text Conversation into a Profitable Sales Channel

Full cCommerce or Conversational Commerce, is a stand-alone, text-based commerce solution that leverages the Full Commerce Payments Gateway and Text2Pay to deliver rich media product promotions and secure transactions directly within messaging (including RCS), enabling cost-effective, frictionless customer experiences.
Why Choose a Private Payment Gateway?
Eliminate Vendor Lock-In and Retail Fee Structures:
Connect directly to over 200 banks and processors at wholesale rates, giving you cost control and freedom from restrictive retail pricing.
Reach any customer with their preferred payment method, exponentially boosting the effectiveness of your sales strategies and marketing campaigns.
Build a scalable, adaptable payment infrastructure to avoid costly interruptions and seamlessly integrate future technologies.

A new architecture to see things in new ways. Storage and processing on each camera eliminates the complexity of separate storage, servers, and analytics.
View video anywhere with nothing to install, and secure access with unique user accounts and data encryption every step of the way
Leverage on-camera processing for real-time video intelligence that brings analytics and insights to new areas

Adaptive security. Automated peace of mind.
Proactively protect, inspect, and adapt your network with the self-configuring, self-maintaining Meraki platform.
Secure every wireless connection with automatic policy enforcement, identity-based access control, and built-in DNS protection
Defend users from threats with cloud-based multi-site management and automated network firmware updates
Engage Your Customers with Secure, Seamless Experiences

Building on the foundation of Fintech Services -the Customer Engagement category ensures that businesses can deliver seamless, secure, and engaging customer experiences across all channels—physical, digital, and mobile. With a combination of Elo Touch Solutions for POS and touchscreen needs, Cisco Meraki for secure cloud-managed networking, and Truly Legit verification for building trust in eCommerce environments, dooFull Commerce provides businesses with a comprehensive infrastructure to enhance customer engagement, trust, and service efficiency.

div.style: display: flex; justify-content: space-evenly; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;
div.video: Your browser does not support the video tag.

div.h4: Elo brings the full house of touchscreen products.
div.p: Start upping the ante at your sports betting shop with Elo’s immersive solutions at every turn.

div.h4: Interactive Office Display Solutions of touchscreen products.
div.p: Elo brings the broadest size offering of interactive displays, enabling organizations and corporate campuses to deploy a consistent experience across all interactive touchpoints. From cubicle to conference room, our interactive solutions help you transform any meeting room or public space into a collaboration center.

div.h4: Enhance patient care with Elo's healthcare solutions.
process Automation in the Industry 4.0 World
div.p: As businesses transform to take advantage of Industry 4.0, a new set of connected, interactive devices are needed to enable multi-functional, intuitive interfaces. With this digital transformation and the ability to access data in real time, technology driven innovations are continuously evolving to accelerate the growth of fully automated processes from commercial kitchens to car factories. Elo's touchscreen and compute product portfolio, and particularly its approach to Android are a key enabler for Industry 4.0. We have created an eco-system of devices purpose-built to work together, streamlining the communications of controls deployed across enterprises.

div.h4: Elo brings the full house of touchscreen products.
div.p: Start upping the ante at your sports betting shop with Elo’s immersive solutions at every turn.

The versatile EloPOS System combines modern aesthetics, modular flexibility and commercial-grade reliability. Purpose-built for point of sale, EloPOS offers a 21.5-inch touchscreen display, choice of Intel’s 9th generation processors and an integrated expansion hub to connect the peripherals you need - whether a customer facing display, payment reader, printer, cash drawer, barcode scanner or scale. From traditional POS to self-service applications, EloPOS delivers the durability needed to survive continuous public use and is backed by Elo’s standard 3-year warranty.

Available in sizes ranging from 15 to 24 inches, including with and without stand options, you can easily configure the I‑Series to fit the needs of your business - from signage and point-of-sale to self-service, automation controls and more.

Built with the reliability-tested performance and security of Intel 12th Generation processors, integrated Trusted Platform Modules, Intel vPro™ and the Windows 10 operating system, the I‑Series 3 delivers the dependability businesses need
Accept all payment methods (card, mobile wallet, etc.) with an integrated payment terminal. Choose from various providers* and let Odoo seamlessly handle the entire payment processing.
*Some models may require an IoT Box.
Odoo Integration + Full Commerce Payment Gateway

Empower Your Business with Strategic ExcellenceThe Strategic Excellence and Leadership (SEAL) category of the dooFull Commerce platform delivers unified business management through seamless Odoo integration. This category represents the third step in the business enablement journey, offering a comprehensive suite of tools to manage every aspect of your business effectively.
One Platform to Manage Your Entire Business

Take control of your operations with dooFull Commerce’s Unified Business Management system. By integrating everything from sales to accounting, inventory to HR, you can streamline processes, eliminate costly software subscriptions, and get real-time insights into your business.

li.p: Centralized inventory management, ensuring you never run out of stock.
Automated accounting that reduces manual work and errors.
Real-time analytics that provide actionable insights into every department.

div.p: Monetize Your Platform and Grow Your Revenue

dooFull Commerce not only helps you run your business but also allows you to create new revenue streams. With our white-label solutions, you can offer the platform to your clients under your brand, unlocking a powerful Systems Monetiztion opportunity that scales with your business.
Monetize Your Platform and Grow Your Revenue

With dooFull Commerce, you can elevate your brand by productizing your system and positioning it as the industry standard. By white-labeling your platform and empowering your competitors to adopt your solution, you not only grow your business but also assist the entire industry. Lead the way by enabling others to thrive, all while generating new revenue streams and solidifying your brand as the go-to choice.

Contact us about anything related to our company or services.
We'll do our best to get back to you as soon as possible.

div.class: carousel-item active oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center pt96 pb-4

h3.strong: From One-Time Gift to Lifelong Supporter.

div.p: Launch fully compliant fundraising sites in minutes—with admin and campaign owner portals built for control and clarity. Accept one-time or recurring donations via online and Text2Pay. Track every dollar by donor, purpose, and campaign—automatically. Built for schools, churches, and nonprofits ready to grow impact and trust.

p.b: More Than an Event System—It's a Growth Engine.

div.p: Unify registrations, lodging, payments, and products in one seamless experience. Built to scale conferences, retreats, festivals, and workshops—with or without lodging. Fully integrated with donations and merchandise for mission-aligned monetization.

p.b: Designed for universities, churches, and anyone ready to grow their events into movements.
Power Your Growth and Next Event with One System
PLMS Brain™ – Smarter. Faster. Actually Enjoyable.

div.p: Building a store doesn’t have to feel like a grind. PLMS Brain™ turns product creation into a streamlined, intuitive process that your admin team will love.
With AI handling the heavy lifting—from listings and cross-sells to content and structure—you’ll go from idea to launch in a fraction of the time.

Track your progress in real time, sync content with your Knowledge Base, and manage massive catalogs without stress or cleanup. What once took days now takes minutes—giving your team back time, clarity, and control.

p.b: Take Control of Your Payments. Grow Without Limits.

div.p: Stop renting your payment system. With direct access to the global payment networks—no middlemen, no hidden hands—you control the rails, the pricing, and the experience. Accept cards, ACH, POS, and Text2Pay with infrastructure built for scale, performance, and profitability.
You're no longer just processing payments—you're owning the path money takes. Enjoy wholesale rates, reduce costs, and future-proof your growth with a system designed to scale with you.
Want your brand front and center? Ask about our white-label upgrade to put your name on every screen and your profit in every transaction.

p.b: Get Direct. Stay in Control. Grow on Your Terms.

div.p: Power every payment in Odoo—eCommerce, POS, Invoicing, Subscriptions and more—with seamless Credit, ACH, Text2Pay, and Tap to Pay integrations.

p.b: Fight Chargebacks with the Safest Transactions Available

div.p: Protect your revenue before, during, and after the transaction. These Pay-Flow blueprints are engineered to reduce fraud, eliminate ambiguity, and ensure every payment is intentional, documented, and defensible.

Every transaction should protect your business. These top Pay-Flows do exactly that—capturing clear customer acknowledgement, collecting a card not present signature, verifying identity, confirming line items, and locking in the payment amount before processing. It’s how you fight chargebacks before they happen—with proof, clarity, and confidence built in.

See how your front line transforms with purpose-built POS solutions. Whether you're managing tables or tuning bikes, our Retail and Restaurant POS systems turn every transaction into a seamless, customer-first experience. Built for speed, trusted for uptime, and ready for Text2Pay—these are the tools that keep your business moving and your margins growing.

p.b: Check out POS Retail and POS Restaurant now.

div.p: From self-service kiosks to gaming floors, healthcare check-ins to industrial control panels—these touchpoints aren’t just screens, they’re revenue engines. Purpose-built for high-traffic, high-trust environments, each device turns interaction into efficiency. Wherever your customers engage or your team operates, these solutions deliver clarity, speed, and control.

p.b: Explore the full range of interactive touch technology now.

div.class: carousel-item active oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center pt96 pb-4

div.p: Fragmented systems waste time and margin. Odoo centralizes your operations—finance, HR, sales, inventory, eCommerce—into a unified, real-time platform. This is how transformation becomes measurable, manageable, and sustainable.

ELO hardware turns interaction into insight. From point-of-sale to digital signage, you control every customer-facing surface while reducing overhead through cloud-managed Android solutions. That’s how transformation meets the front line.

Your growth depends on reliable infrastructure. Cisco Meraki delivers cloud-managed networking that adapts as you scale—no excess complexity, no IT sprawl. It’s how transformation stays secure, simple, and under your command.

Transformation stalls when budgets block decisions. Dimension Funding removes that friction. With fixed monthly payments and fast approvals up to $500K—no financials required—your clients gain the power to say yes. Over 40 years of trusted financing means you close deals faster, and they grow without delay.
